todos.title: Fix CS1503 errors in JsonFilePipelineDefinitionRepositoryTests.cs
todos.description: Update constructor calls for JsonFilePipelineDefinitionRepository to correctly pass IOptions<PipelineSettings>.
changeList: Modify constructor calls for JsonFilePipelineDefinitionRepository in JsonFilePipelineDefinitionRepositoryTests.cs

mistakes.description: Atlas created a new branch instead of applying changes to the user-specified branch.
mistakes.fix: Always confirm the target branch with the user before creating new branches or committing changes. If a branch is specified in the initial prompt or context, use that branch.
